name: Choo-Choo Tribe
description:
Fight your way through the onslaught of evil cultists and the—demon spider train—"Charles" himself!

THIS GAME IS A PARODY OF MONSTER TRIBE + CHOO-CHOO CHARLES
This project was created in under 24 hours and is not a true representation of either project. This was a video the developer of Monster Tribe (Reece Geofroy) created with the help/input of the developer of Choo-Choo Charles (Gavin Eisenbeisz)

Gavin and I have been planning a collaboration video for a few months now, so with development of my dream indie game Monster Tribe slowing down I took it upon myself to reimagine both of our games in a new way! This challenge was meant to be a fun 1 day project, so the game may not be polished up to the normal standard of indie games I release on Steam.


CONTROLS:
 Left: On-Foot                                                          Right: In-Train
